games.title: Geometry Dash
games.description: Geometry Dash Online is a free side-scrolling platformer played in sync with musical rhythms. Groove your way over and under obstacles to keep the musical momentum alive. If you slip up, it’s back to the beginning!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Drift Boss
games.description: Drift Boss is a casual one-click driving game where you drive your car around very tricky corners and over bumps, aiming to reach what seems like an infinite end! The race track has no guardrails, so you will fall off the platform and into an abyss if you make one false move. Keep playing to earn rewards and unlock better cars!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Bubble Shooter
games.description: Bubble Shooter is a free casual puzzle game inspired by Puzzle Bobble. Match 3 of the same colored bubble to pop the group!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Slice Master
games.description: Slice Master is a casual one-person game whose goal is to slice everything in sight, well, almost everything. This one-button game is driven by precision, timing, and discernment to rack up a high score. Flying knives are generally a no-no, but in this game, they are the only way to progress to new blades and skins.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Eggy Car
games.description: Eggy Car is a casual game where you drive a car containing a loose egg over hilly roads. When the egg falls out of your vehicle, it breaks and the game ends. RIP! Collect power-ups to help you get further. Good luck and godspeed egg soldier.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Tiny Fishing
games.description: Tiny Fishing is a fun fishing game where you draw your line and hook as many fish as possible. Each fish you catch on your line earns you money. Keep fishing to earn more coins and unlock upgrades!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Tile Guru
games.description: Tile Guru is a casual puzzle tile-matching game that combines mental sharpness with relaxation. Spend just 10 minutes a day matching vibrant 3D tiles and finding new fruit designs while mastering strategic match flips. With its unique puzzlescapes, escalating challenges, and a serene zen-inspired color palette, this game offers a perfect blend of brain training and tranquility, making it your ideal daily escape.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Piles of Mahjong
games.description: Piles of Mahjong is an engaging and relaxing puzzle game that combines the classic elements of Mahjong with a match-three twist. As you progress through the levels, you’ll need to clear stacks of tiles by matching three identical ones, but be careful—strategic thinking is essential to avoid getting stuck!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Little Alchemy
games.description: Little Alchemy is a creative and educational crafting game where players combine different elements to create new items. Starting with basic elements like air, earth, fire, and water, players mix these to produce more complex items.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Little Alchemy 2
games.description: Little Alchemy 2 is an intuitive online crafting game developed by Recloak. The aim is to combine elements to create new ones. Start by mixing Earth, air, fire, and water to produce new elements. Discover over 700 items and unlock the recipes to time, matter, and the Universe!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Getaway Shootout
games.description: Getaway Shooter is a chaotic two-player game where you race three others to the finish line. Your moves are limited, and you can only move by jumping left or right, making the race tricky! Pick up guns and other weapons along the way to use against the others. May the best player win!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Rooftop Snipers
games.description: Rooftop Snipers is a chaotic two-button action sniper game where you can only shoot and jump. You can play the game with a friend or on the computer. It’s one of our many amazing two-player games you can play with friends!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Far Orion: New Worlds
games.description: Far Orion: New Worlds is an action game where you can command a team of brave heroes and lead your world to victory! The year is 2121, and technology has advanced far beyond the bounds of our wildest fantasies, but great progress also demands a great sacrifice. Use your strategy to set up your heroes and power card, beat all your opponents, and explore other worlds in search of treasure and limitless power!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Battleship,
games.description: Battleship is a classic two-player naval strategy game that you can play for free in your web browser. You are the commanding officer of an elite fleet of battleships at war with an equally capable enemy. Take turns to fire on your opponent's territory using an array of ranged weaponry.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Run 3
games.description: Explore outer space in Run 3. Run 3 is an incredibly addicting, endless runner-type action/platforming game in which you play as a little grey alien. The little alien is trespassing in an architecturally challenged area that is floating in space. After trespassing in the prohibited zone which is full of increasing amounts of dangerous holes, you run. If you fall into one of the holes, you will find yourself lost in space so make sure to watch your step!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Ducklife
games.description: Duck Life is the first game in the Duck Life series. A tornado has struck your farm and destroyed everything. All that remains is a single duck egg. Train this duckling to peak athletic form so you can earn money to rebuild the farm.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Jacksmith
games.description: Jacksmith is a crafting game where you forge weapons for soldiers and join them on the battlefield as they slay monsters. Build the perfect weapons to see the soldiers into battle and give them the greatest chance of success!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Cuphead
games.description: Cuphead is a sidescrolling action game developed by StudioMDHR. Play one of the biggest boss battles where you control a warplane carrying Cuphead. Choose your desired difficulty level and jump into the dog fight.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Cookie Delivery
games.description: Cookie Delivery is an action game about being a cookie deliveryman. This work is dangerous and difficult; in addition to obstacles on the road, you have to shoot back the animals who want to steal the cookies.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: House of Hazards
games.description: House of Hazards is a fun local multiplayer game where each player completes tasks around the house while avoiding hazards. How far will you get before one of your friends trips you up?
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Dead Land: Survival
games.description: Dead Land: Survival is a survival horror game set in a zombie-infested apocalyptic world where you fight for survival with powerful skills you accumulate throughout gameplay. Fortify your shelter against relentless undead attacks and scavenge through desolate territories in search of valuable resources. Craft weapons, armor, and essential gear to give yourself an edge in these hostile lands. With danger around every corner, your aim is to keep calm and survive the end of the zombie apocalypse.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Castle Craft
games.description: Castle Craft is a mystical adventure puzzle game where you merge resources while looking for Fiona's missing husband, Michael, all the while uncovering plenty of mysteries along the way. Begin in a fog-covered land, using ancient keys to explore hidden realms and trace the path of your lost family through different eras. Discover mysterious lands and piece together an enchanting legacy.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Magic World
games.description: Magic World is an adventure puzzle game where you engage in unique battles with mythical creatures and fierce enemies by defeating them via gem matching. The gameplay is strategic, as this is not your ordinary battle. Your enemies will use cover and battlefield advantages against you. You'll need a well-thought-out strategy and smart leveling up of all heroes to achieve victory!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Daily Room Escape
games.description: Daily Room Escape offers a brain-teasing puzzle adventure game where you are in a unique room filled with intricate riddles and hidden clues. Sharpen your problem-solving skills and unravel mind-bending puzzles to find the key to freedom. Each day brings a new theme, a different set of challenges, and fresh surprises waiting to be discovered. Keep coming back for your daily dose of brain-teasing fun, and see if you have what it takes to outsmart each escape room.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Doors Online
games.description: Doors Online is an escape adventure game set in a creepy hotel where danger and riddles lurk behind every door. Explore eerie rooms, search for keys, avoid terrifying monsters, and find hiding spots to survive. Use your dexterity and wit to reach the end of this mysterious journey!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Battle Arena
games.description: Battle Arena is a thrilling RPG adventure battle game that seamlessly blends heart-pounding action with strategic gameplay. Create your team from over 50 unique heroes, each inspired by iconic characters you know and love. Dive into intense real-time PvP battles where your skills and tactics are put to the ultimate test. Join forces with fellow guild players to take on epic quests across breathtaking locations, from ancient ruins to mystical landscapes. As you progress, you can upgrade your heroes and gear, enhancing their abilities and unlocking new powers.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Hex Empire
games.description: Hex Empire is the action packed turn-based strategy game in which you will try and conquer all by domination of territory. You will start with a single nation, then your goal is to strategize and dominate the map by overruling countries attacking city by city with your armies and more importantly your winning tactics.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Dark Stones: Card Battle RPG
games.description: Dark Stones: Card Battle RPG is a strategic card-based battle game set in a dark fantasy world of magic and elemental forces. Assemble a team of humans, orcs, mages, elves, and other creatures to defeat powerful foes, capture their souls, and unlock new powers. Explore lands teeming with danger, from snowy valleys to scorched deserts and realms of the dead, while uncovering hidden secrets and facing epic challenges.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Mirrorland
games.description: Mirrorland is a turn-based strategy set in a fantastical realm teeming with heroes and monsters. Embark on an epic journey through this magical world, brimming with perilous encounters and thrilling adventures at every turn. Traverse through the looking glass into a realm of enigmatic puzzles and terrifying foes. Unravel the mysteries, aid mythical beings, vanquish villains, and safeguard the universe of Mirrorland. With stunning visuals, an immersive storyline, diverse hero selection, and engaging multiplayer features, prepare for an unforgettable quest where bravery and cunning are your greatest weapons.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Immortal Taoists
games.description: Immortal Taoists is a captivating idle game where players embark on a journey to immortality in a serene fantasy world. As a protagonist, you'll explore ancient ruins, fight demons, and master Kungfu techniques. Join martial sects, adopt immortal beasts, and discover mystical treasures while crafting powerful equipment and elixirs. Create your unique legend in this immersive novel game.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Marble Run
games.description: Marble Run is a building sim where you create your own marble run using a range of tools. Use an array of track pieces to build a marble run from top to bottom, then watch the marble roll through your creation for your own enjoyment.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Words of Wonders
games.description: Words of Wonders is a crossword puzzle where you connect letters to reveal hidden words. Test your vocabulary and find all the words to progress and reach more challenging levels. Will you become a master wordsmith in this delightful word game?
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Word Wipe
games.description: Word Wipe is a word search puzzle game with a twist. You can use letters from all around and in any direction. When you combine the letters to make a word, the letters disappear from the grid. This drops the position of the letters above, leading to all kinds of unique letter combinations!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Word Scramble
games.description: Word Scramble is a classic word game where you unscramble letters to find words. Find one word after the next and see how many you can identify before the timer runs out!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: LA Times Crossword
games.description: LA Times Crossword is a popular puzzle game that features new crossword puzzles. It offers a variety of challenges and allows players to keep track of their records. With the ability to validate answers and access helpful hints, the game ensures that you can progress through the puzzles and solve them accurately. It is available to play online, providing convenience and accessibility for crossword enthusiasts.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Mergest Kingdom
games.description: Mergest Kingdom is a merge puzzle and match-3 game where you build your own kingdom by combining resources in groups of three. Match items to unlock new resources, complete quests, and expand your territory. With hundreds of objects to merge and challenges to complete, you can steadily grow your kingdom and shape it the way you want. Jump in and start building today.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Candy Riddles
games.description: Candy Riddles is a puzzle match-3 puzzle game bursting with tasty-looking, mouth-watering sweets! Prepare for a world of sugary fun as you match cookies, donuts, ice creams, and more to rack up points and progress through challenging levels. With each successful match of three or more treats, you'll clear the board and make way for even more delicious combinations. The more matches you make, the bigger your rewards, so keep matching and savor the sweet satisfaction of getting to the next level!
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.

games.title: Zoo Boom
games.description: Zoo Boom is a puzzle match-3 game with mission-based rounds to challenge you at every level. This fun animal-themed game is an addictive one-click game where your objective is to strategically clear boards of animal tiles without getting yourself stuck into a lack of matches. Get ready for some good old-fashioned match game fun.
games.instructions: Use your mouse and keyboard to play the game.
